columns.name: id
columns.description: The id of the workspaces.

columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the workspaces.

columns.name: location
columns.description: The location of the Log Analytics workspace.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The type of the Log Analytics workspace.

columns.name: sku
columns.description: The SKU (pricing level) of the Log Analytics workspace.

columns.name: retention_in_days
columns.description: The retention period for the Log Analytics workspace data in days.

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: The provisioning state of the Log Analytics workspace.

columns.name: workspace_capping
columns.description: The workspace capping properties.

columns.name: created_date
columns.description: Workspace creation date.

columns.name: modified_date
columns.description: Workspace modification date.

columns.name: customer_id
columns.description: Represents the ID associated with the workspace.

columns.name: public_network_access_for_ingestion
columns.description: The network access type for accessing Log Analytics ingestion.

columns.name: public_network_access_for_query
columns.description: The network access type for accessing Log Analytics query.

columns.name: force_cmk_for_query
columns.description: Indicates whether customer managed storage is mandatory for query management.

columns.name: private_link_scoped_resources
columns.description: List of linked private link scope resources.

columns.name: enable_data_export
columns.description: Flag that indicates if data should be exported.

columns.name: immediate_purge_data_on_30_days
columns.description: Flag that describes if we want to remove the data after 30 days.

columns.name: enable_log_access_using_only_resource_permissions
columns.description: Flag that indicates which permission to use - resource or workspace or both.

columns.name: cluster_resource_id
columns.description: Dedicated LA cluster resourceId that is linked to the workspaces.

columns.name: disable_local_auth
columns.description: Disable Non-AAD based Auth.

columns.name: tags
columns.description: The tags assigned to the Log Analytics workspace.

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: region
columns.description: The region of the Log Analytics workspace.

columns.name: resource_group
columns.description: The resource group of the Log Analytics workspace.
